SourceString: <%sB_ACTOR> and co. caught the enemy off guard!
The <%sB_ACTOR> caught the party off guard!
The <%sB_ACTOR> caught the party off guard!
The monsters dropped a treasure chest!
Your equipment bag is full.\nSort your equipment?
Couldn't receive all of the items\nas some could not be carried.
The party quietly closed the treasure chest.
<%sB_ACTOR> does not know any\nskills that can be used in battle!
<%sB_ACTOR> does not know any\nspells that can be used in battle!
You do not have any items that can\nbe used in battle!
You have no other equipment to equip!
Can't use the <%sB_TARGET>\nbecause you don't have\n<%sB_ITEM> equipped!
This item will have no effect if used in\nbattle.
Use your skill points right away?
You cannot flee from this battle!
But the enemies have you surrounded!
What's this?! The <%sB_TARGET> gets up\nand looks over as if it wants to join the\nparty!
There are no targets for the\n<%sB_TARGET>!
You cannot use <%sB_TARGET>\nbecause you have no weapon equipped!
You learned the Coup de Grace <%sB_TARGET>!
There are no enemies to use Scout Attack on.
You can no longer use Scout Attack in\nthis battle!
You have not yet read the Scout Book\nrequired to scout this monster!
The Monster Tavern is full, so you can't\nscout any more monsters!
Name the <%sB_TARGET> right away?\nTheir name can be changed at any time at a\nMonster Tavern.
You can only bring one fellow monster with you.
Which monster will you send to\nMonster Tavern?
Cannot equip as you are undergoing a\nDraconian Quest.
You cannot call monsters in this battle!
<%sB_ACTOR> is charmed\nand cannot be switched out!

<%sB_ACTOR> is stuck\nand cannot be switched out!
<%sB_ACTOR> is trapped\nand cannot be switched out!
<%sB_ACTOR> cannot act due to an\naltered form and cannot be switched out!

You cannot change a guest party member's\ntactics!
You earned no experience from this battle.

Your equipment bag is full.\nSort out your equipment bag?
Your currency bag is full.\nSort out your currency bag?

<%sB_ACTOR> enters a state of super high\ntension!!

Please set \n members who can fight as battle members.

<%sB_ACTOR> cannot be moved to\nstandby in the battle!
